alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:16PM CST until January 30 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Minor agricultural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Sunday the stage was 29.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 30.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 29.5 Sun 7 pm CST 30.1 29.8 29.5 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to remain aware of the latest forecasts and associated flood risk for their area. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
